myMessages.name: 10/13/24, 10:30 AM
myMessages.message: A squirrel was spotted perched on a mailbox, staring intently at passing cars. Possible reconnaissance activity.

myMessages.name: 10/16/24, 3:15 PM
myMessages.message: Two squirrels were seen chasing each other in circles around a tree. Looked like a training drill or advanced tactical maneuvers.

myMessages.name: 10/18/24, 6:45 PM
myMessages.message: A particularly chubby squirrel was caught dragging a slice of pizza up a tree. Possible supply run for the squirrel resistance.

myMessages.name: 10/20/24, 10:45 AM
myMessages.message: A squirrel was staring at me from across the street. Possibly trying to read my mind.
